## State New Economy Index

[li_economic_index](https://github.com/OHI-Science/mhi/blob/master/region2017/layers/)

The State New Economy Index uses 25 indicators to measure the extent to which state economies are knowledge-based, globalized, entrepreneurial, IT-driven, and innovation-oriented.

### Reference

[Information Technology & Innovation Foundation](https://itif.org/publications/2014/06/11/2014-state-new-economy-index)
